sentence: Aluoch, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies often breath fast but it can be a problem if they are grunting, their nose flares or they are wheezing. You should come to clinic if you notice any of these. Is your baby having any issues with their breathing or feeding?

Mama Jose, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?

Violet, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you used the injection for Family Planning? It is very effective and works well for many women and is safe while breastfeeding. Some women experience irregular bleeding, less frequent or more frequent periods. If you want regular predicatable periods this may not be the best method for you.

Kerubo, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Wakati mwingine matatizo hutokea wakati unaumwa na wakati wa kujifungua, kama kutokwa na damu au mishtuko ya kifafa , ambayo yanahitaji wafanyakazi wa afya wenye ujuzi, dawa na vifaa vya kutibu. Bila matibabu hayo, mama na mtoto wanaweza kufariki. Kwa hivyo ni salama kabisa kujifungua katika kituo ambacho kinaweza kushughulikia matatizo haya na mengine zaidi. Utafikaje kwenye kituo?

Mama Precious, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto wachanga mara nyingi hupumua kwa haraka kuliko watoto wakubwa kiasi lakini wakati wanapumua kwa haraka sana, hii inaweza kuwa ishara ya ugonjwa. Mtoto anapaswa kupumua chini ya mara 60 kwa dakika. Ikiwa una wasiwasi juu ya kupumua kwa mtoto wako, jaribu kuhesabu idadi ya pumzi kwa dakika moja. Umegundua tatizo lolote na kupumua kwa mtoto?

Wangui, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies sleep most of the time. When the baby is awake, they will move their arms and legs and turn their head. If the baby doesn't move when awake, try stimulating the baby by tapping their foot. If the baby moves but stops, this is a danger sign and the baby is not well at all. Or is the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign. Is your baby moving when they are awake?

Mama Noreen, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?

Aliviza, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Enjoy getting to know your baby: Talk to them and learn their signals when they are sleepy or hungry. Some babies when they are hungry cry while others suck on their hands and some smack their lips or turn their head to look for the breast or bottle. Have you noticed a pattern with your baby?

Gladys, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies often breath faster than older children but when it is very fast, this can be a sign of infection. The baby should breath less than 60 times per minute. If you are worried about your baby's breathing try and count the number of breaths in one minute. Have you noticed problems with the baby's breathing?

Ruth, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Make sure you come in 4 times for antenatal care. We check your blood to see if it is strong, check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. The 4th visit includes checking that the baby is in a good position. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?

Mama Winner, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mama Winner huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Umejifunguwa? Tuko hapa kwa ajili yako. Tafadhali tujulishe mara tu unapojifunguwa ili tuweze kukusaidia baada ya mtoto kuzaliwa.

Sandra, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies sleep most of the time. When the baby is awake, they will move their arms and legs and turn their head. If the baby doesn't move when awake, try stimulating the baby by tapping their foot. If the baby moves but stops, this is a danger sign. Or if the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign and the baby is not well at all. Is your baby moving when they are awake?

Emily, this is Brenda from Mathare. Breastfeeding a baby right after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & cleans out the stomach. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?
Asha, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. We are checking to see how you are doing. How is your bleeding? Do you have any pain in your lower abdomen? Any fevers? Please let us know if you feel unwell.

Min Solo, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. The IUCD or coil is very effective for family planning. Easy to put in, safe for years the IUCD or coil can be removed at any time! Ask about the coil at your family planning visit. Do you know anyone who has the coil?

Mama Machaa, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unapaswa kumpeleka mtoto kwenye kituo cha afya ikiwa mtoto hanyonyi vizuri, ana jinyoosha jinsi isiyo ya kawaida, ana pumua kwa haraka au hachezi vizuri kama kawaida.Mtoto wako ana matatizo yeyote haya? Tafadhali tujulishe kama mtoto wako ana matatizo haya au mengine?

June, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. How are you feeling? Breast milk is the best food for the baby and provides all the food and fluid that the baby needs. It protects the infant against infections. A baby should be breastfed at least 8 times a day in the first month. How is breastfeeding going for you and the baby?
Seline, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?

Daina0, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?
Wendy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. How is breastfeeding going for you and the baby? Do you know your baby's weight at birth?

Anita, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo Bad swelling of hands and face or a bad headache are signs of a problem. Ask your family to take you to the clinic if they see this. Have you had any swelling or headaches during pregnancy? Are they getting worse?

Susan, this is Brenda from Mathare. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Without that treatment, the mother and baby could die. Therefore it is safest to deliver in a facility that can manage these and other problems. How will you arrive at the facility?

Wakati mwingine matatizo hutokea wakati unaumwa na wakati wa kujifungua, kama kutokwa na damu au mishtuko ya kifafa , ambayo yanahitaji wafanyakazi wa afya wenye ujuzi, dawa na vifaa vya kutibu. Bila matibabu hayo, mama na mtoto wanaweza kufariki. Kwa hivyo ni salama kabisa kujifungua katika kituo ambacho kinaweza kushughulikia matatizo haya na mengine zaidi. Utafikaje kwenye kituo?

Mama Cady, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto wachanga mara nyingi hupumua kwa haraka kuliko watoto wakubwa kiasi lakini wakati wanapumua kwa haraka sana, hii inaweza kuwa ishara ya ugonjwa. Mtoto anapaswa kupumua chini ya mara 60 kwa dakika. Ikiwa una wasiwasi juu ya kupumua kwa mtoto wako, jaribu kuhesabu idadi ya pumzi kwa dakika moja. Umegundua tatizo lolote na kupumua kwa mtoto?

Pendo, this is Brenda from Mathare. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Without that treatment, the mother and baby could die. Therefore it is safest to deliver in a facility that can manage these and other problems. How will you arrive at the facility?

Mama Latrivia, this is Brenda from Mathare. Regular, strong stomach pains are a sign of labour. If you feel this strong tightening regularly pains, leaking of fluid or bleeding, go to the facility. Do you feel any contractions? Do you have any concerns?

Moraa, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo.Angalia mikono na miguu ya watoto ili kuangalia kama ni manjano. Ikiwa una wasiwasi kuhusu rangi ya ngozi ya mtoto, tafadhali tujulishe au leta mtoto kwenye kliniki. Je! Umeona ishara yeyote ya manjano Je! Mikono na miguu ya mtoto ni manjano?

Elizabeth, this is Brenda from Mathare. This week our messages will be stopping. Please come in for your final visit with us when your baby is about 14 weeks old. Let us know if you have any diffculty coming in. We would like to know your experience with us and if this service has been helpful. We look forward to seeing you.

Mercy, this is Brenda from Mathare. Make sure you come in 4 times for antenatal care. We check your blood to see if it is strong, check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. The 4th visit includes checking that the baby is in a good position. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?

Min Tyrens, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Dhodho nyathi ban'g nyuol konyo chak wuok. Chak makuongo mopoto maraton'g nigi dhadhu mang'eny kendo gengo tuoche. Chak nitie kod pi ma nyathi dwaro, kik imi nyathi gimoro amora mimadho. Bende ipango dhodho nyathi?
Petronilla, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wewe na mtoto wako mnaendeleaje? Umeona mtoto wako akijinyoosha ovyo ovyo kama mwenye kifafa?
Eunice, this is Brenda from Mathare. How are you and your baby doing? Have you noted any convulsions or fits in your baby?

Nyasema, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. kunyonyesha mtoto punde anapozaliwa husaidia maziwa kutoka. Maziwa ya kwanza ya manjano yana vitamini mingi na huzuia mtoto kutokana na magonjwa. Maziwa yana maji yote ambayo mtoto anahitaji,jiepushe na vinywaji vingine. Umepanga kunyonyesha?

Mama Derro, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Ni salama sana kwa wanawake wote kujifungua katika kituo cha afya kwa sababu wafanyakazi wa afya wana ujuzi na vifaa vinavyohitajika kusaidia kuhakikisha unajifungua salama na unajifungua mtoto mwenye afya. Unapanga kujifungua wapi?

Sharon, this is Brenda from Mathare. Breastfeeding a baby right after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & cleans out the stomach. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?

Mama Angel, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto kwa kawaida huenda haja kubwa mara moja kwa siku lakini baadhi huenda mara nyingi zaidi. Ikiwa mtoto wako anaenda haja kubwa chini ya mara tatu kwa wiki na anasumbua anaweza kuwa unahitaji usaidizi. Je! Una matatizo yoyote?

Mama Kare, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wakati mwingine wamama wa mara ya kwanza wanaweza kuhisi huzuni au wasiwasi wakati wowote. Hii hutokea kwa wanawake wengi na inaweza kusababisha kulia na ugumu wa kulala. Una matatizo yoyote haya?

Mama Izoo, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wiki hii SMS zitaacha. Tafadhali kuja utone kwako ziara yako ya mwisho mtoto wako akifikisha wiki 14 . Tujulisha ikiwa una tatizo lolote kwa kuja kutuona. Tungependa kujdiffcultyua ushirikiano wetu na wewe umekuwaje na ikiwa huu mradi umekusaidia. Tunatarajia kukuona.

Linda, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Be isetiyo gi sindan e yor komo nyuol? Otio maber ne mine mang'eny to en kare kidhodho. Mon moko rembegi biro sama ok kare, moko remo bironegi matin moko to yudo mang'eny. Ka digomb yudo remo ma ochanre to ma ok dibed yor komo nyuol maber kodi.

Mama Jelix, maen Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Tem matek ibi e clinic mari di ngwen. Mondo wapim rembi kendo wakonyi loso chenro mari mar nyuol. Ee limbe mar angwen, wabiro ng'iyo ka nyathini onindo maber. Be dibed gi penjo moro amora ka lure kod wach nyuol mari? To bende iwinjo ka nyathi tugoga?

Elizabeth, this is Brenda from Mathare. The umbilical cord stump will dry up and fall off after 1-3 weeks. There may be a little bleeding. If the area is painful, red or has smelly discharge, please come to the clinic. Is the area healing well?

Janet, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto katika umri huu wanaweza kutabasu na hata kufikia vitu. Jaribu kuweka shaker au toy katika mkono wake na kuona nini atafanya. Je, mtoto wako anafikia vitu na una matatizo yoyote?
Mama Stafo, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you had your baby? Please let us know if you are having any problems. Where are you delivering your baby?

Ondiala, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Over the next few weeks we will send you messages to help you make family planning decisions. Planning your family and spacing pregnancy is good for your health. Are you planning another pregnancy in the future?
Mama Victor, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wewe na mtoto wako mnaendeleaje? Umeona mtoto wako akijinyoosha ovyo ovyo kama mwenye kifafa?

Phoeby, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. When you start a family planning method, sometimes there can be side effects or your body may take time to adjust. Usually these subside within weeks. Before you stop or change methods, be sure to talk to the nurses. Have you chosen a method? Are you having any side effects?

Karibu kwa Mobile WACh NEO. Kazi nzuri kwa kuja kwa ziara yako ya kliniki! Utapokea SMS /ujumbe mfupi kila wiki ambayo itakusaidia wakati wa ujauzito na miezi mbili za kwanza za maisha ya mtoto wako.Tafadhali tutumie SMS/ujumbe mfupi na uuulize maswali au mashaka yoyote unayo.

Nan, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Irregular bleeding is very common while breastfeeding, and on some family planning methods. It does not mean that something is wrong. Do you have any concerns about bleeding while using family planning?
Josephine, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. You should come to the facility if you have heavy bleeding, severe pain, fevers, fits or a bad headache. Have you had any of these problems?

Moraa,huyu ni Mercy kutokaRachuonyo. Ni muhimu kuweka nafasi kati ya mtoto mmoja na mwingine. Fikiria juu ya kupanga uzazi kabla ya kwenda kwa kliniki. Kuna aina mingi na ni chaguo lako. Tafadhali ongea na muuguzi kwa ziara yako ijayo. Tunaweza kukusaidia na mawaidha yoyote?

If the baby doesn't move when awake, try stimulating the baby by tapping their foot. If the baby moves but stops, this is a danger sign. Or if the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign and the baby is not well at all. Is your baby moving when they are awake?
Mercy, this is Brenda from Mathare. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. The messages will stop soon though you can still ask questions. Has this been helpful for you are your baby?

Sophy, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is best to space your children. Think about family planning before you go to the clinic. There are many options and it is your choice. Please talk to the nurse about family planning at the next visit. Can we help with any advice?

Mtoto anapaswa kunyonyesha mara nane kwa siku katika mwezi wa kwanza. Je! Kunyonyesha kunakukupelekaje wewe na mtoto?

Warwaki e mobile WACh NEO! Itimo maber kuom biro e limbe Mari! Ibiro yudo SMS /ote machwok juma ka juma mabiro konyi ndalo ma ipek kod dweche ariyo mokwongo e ngima mar nyathini. Wakwayi mondo idwuok SMS / ote machwok kendo inyiswa penjo kata wach moro amora ma in go.

Mama Mburu, this is Brenda from Mathare. The Implant is for family planning. It is placed in your arm and is very effective for 3 years. The Implant can be removed at any time! Ask about the Implant at your family planning visit. Do you have any questions about the Implant?
Mama Mose, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako amefikisha wakati wa kupewa polio, DPT na chanjo ya pneumococcal. Je! Mtoto wako amepokea chanjo ya wiki 6 kutoka kliniki?

Mama Abby, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kulia inaweza kuwa shida sana kwa wazazi. Ikiwa mtoto wako analia kwa muda mrefu haswa mchana au jioni, hii inaweza kuwa anaumwa na tumbo. Jaribu kumlaza mtoto wako kwenye paja lako kwa tumbo yake na kumsugua mgongo au kumtuliza kwa mikono yako ukiwa umebeba uso chini. Tujulishe kama una hii shida na unahitaji ushauri zaidi.

Laventer, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. One of the places a baby can get an infection is the skin. Pus and redness are signs of infection. Is there pus coming out of the umbilical cord? Does the cord have bad smell. Are there any skin rashes?

Salome, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies normally poo once per day but some go more often. If your baby is going less than three times per week and is fussy they may need some help. Are you having any concerns?

Nancy, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Samoro mio ka omako ich mokuongo onyalo bedo gi kuyo kata paro mang'eny gi wasiwasi. Mae timore ne mon mang'eny to nyalo mio gi mirima mar yuak kod koso nindo. Bende in gi shida makamagi?

Ann, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Hakikisha umekuja kwa huduma ya ujauzito hata mpaka mwisho wa ujauzito wako. Tuangalie kama kuna shida yoyote na tukusaidia kupanga mpango wa kujifungua. Una maswali au wasiwasi wowote? Je, unasikia mtoto akicheza mara kwa mara?

Jihadharini na nini kinachoshawishi mtoto wako kama kuimba, kumbembeleza au kunyonya. Je! Mtoto wako analia kwa zaidi ya daika 30 wakati yuko macho? Je! Una matatizo yoyote?

Beril, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies often breath faster than older children but when it is very fast, this can be a sign of infection. The baby should breath less than 60 times per minute. If you are worried about your baby's breathing try and count the number of breaths in one minute. Have you noticed problems with the baby's breathing?
Betty, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako amefikisha wakati wa kupewa polio, DPT na chanjo ya pneumococcal. Je! Mtoto wako amepokea chanjo ya wiki 6 kutoka kliniki?

Mama Jacinta, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop – if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?
Angela, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?
Mama Angel, this is Brenda from Mathare. You should come to the facility if you have heavy bleeding, severe pain, fevers, fits or a bad headache. Have you had any of these problems?

Mama Nyambura, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?

Karibu kwa Mobile WACh NEO. Kazi nzuri kwa kuja kwa ziara yako ya kliniki! Njeri, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?

Welcome to Mobile WACh NEO! Good job coming in for your visit! You will receive weekly SMS to help support you during pregnancy and during the first months of your baby's life. Mama Clanis, this is Brenda from Mathare. You should come to the facility if you have heavy bleeding, severe pain, fevers, fits or a bad headache. Have you had any of these problems?

Mama Njeri, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wakati mwingine matatizo hutokea wakati unaumwa na wakati wa kujifungua, kama kutokwa na damu au mishtuko ya kifafa , ambayo yanahitaji wafanyakazi wa afya wenye ujuzi, dawa na vifaa vya kutibu. Bila matibabu hayo, mama na mtoto wanaweza kufariki. Kwa hivyo ni salama kabisa kujifungua katika kituo ambacho kinaweza kushughulikia matatizo haya na mengine zaidi. Utafikaje kwenye kituo?

Mama Esther, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. We are checking to see how you are doing. How is your bleeding? Do you have any pain in your lower abdomen? Any fevers? Please let us know if you feel unwell.

Mercy, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kulia inaweza kuwa shida sana kwa wazazi. Ikiwa mtoto wako analia kwa muda mrefu haswa mchana au jioni, hii inaweza kuwa anaumwa na tumbo. Jaribu kumlaza mtoto wako kwenye paja lako kwa tumbo yake na kumsugua mgongo au kumtuliza kwa mikono yako ukiwa umebeba uso chini. Tujulishe kama una hii shida na unahitaji ushauri zaidi.

Emelda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto hulala wakati mwingi. Wakati mtoto ako macho, watanyoosha mikono na miguu na kutingiza kichwa. Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?
Mama Eric, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wewe na mtoto wako mnaendeleaje? Mtoto wako ana wiki tatu hivi sasa. Je, ulimpeleka kliniki ya wiki mbili ya kuangaliwa?

Sarah, this is Brenda from Mathare. Enjoy getting to know your baby: Talk to them and learn their signals when they are sleepy or hungry. Some babies when they are hungry cry while others suck on their hands and some smack their lips or turn their head to look for the breast or bottle. Have you noticed a pattern with your baby?

Vicky, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo Bad swelling of hands and face or a bad headache are signs of a problem. Ask your family to take you to the clinic if they see this. Have you had any swelling or headaches during pregnancy? Are they getting worse?

Welcome to Mobile WACh NEO! Good job coming in for your visit! You will receive weekly SMS to help support you during pregnancy and during the first months of your baby's life. Kwamboka, huyu ni Brenda kutoka kwa Mathare. Asante kwa kujiunga na sisi kwenye mradi wa Mobile WACh NEO. SMS zitaacha kuja sasa ingawa bado unaweza kutumia huduma hii kwa maswali hadi Septemba. Beatrice, this is Brenda from Mathare. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Alice, this is Brenda from Mathare. Over the next few weeks we will send you messages to help you make family planning decisions. Planning your family and spacing pregnancy is good for your health. Are you planning another pregnancy in the future?

Doreen, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto kwa kawaida huenda haja kubwa mara moja kwa siku lakini baadhi huenda mara nyingi zaidi. Ikiwa mtoto wako anaenda haja kubwa chini ya mara tatu kwa wiki na anasumbua anaweza kuwa unahitaji usaidizi. Je! Una matatizo yoyote?

Sophy, this is Brenda from Mathare. Have you used the injection for Family Planning? It is very effective and works well for many women and is safe while breastfeeding. Martha Maluki, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare Unahisije? Ni kawaida bado kusikia uchovu na kuwa na maumivu hata baada ya kujifunguwa.

Phanice, this is Brenda from Mathare. Over the next few weeks we will send you messages to help you make family planning decisions. Planning your family and spacing pregnancy is good for your health. Are you planning another pregnancy in the future?

Elizabeth, this is Brenda from Mathare. If your baby has frequent spitting up or vomiting, makes gagging noises and seems uncomfortable, this may be reflux. Smaller more frequent feedings and keeping the baby upright after feeding can help. Is your baby having any isseus with feeding?

Dorry, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies sleep most of the time. When the baby is awake, they will move their arms and legs and turn their head. If the baby doesn't move when awake, try stimulating the baby by tapping their foot. If the baby moves but stops, this is a danger sign and the baby is not well at all. Or is the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign. Is your baby moving when they are awake?

Susan, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Hakikisha umekuja kwa huduma ya ujauzito hata mpaka mwisho wa ujauzito wako. Tuangalie kama kuna shida yoyote na tukusaidia kupanga mpango wa kujifungua. Una maswali au wasiwasi wowote? Je, unasikia mtoto akicheza mara kwa mara?

Violet, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Make sure you come in for antenatal care even at the end of your pregnancy. We check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?
Mama Joshua, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unaweza kuzuia maambukizi kwa kuosha mikono yako na kuweka kitovu cha mtoto safi. Je! Una tatizo lolote na mtoto?

Irene Juma, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies often breath faster than older children but when it is very fast, this can be a sign of infection. The baby should breath less than 60 times per minute. If you are worried about your baby's breathing try and count the number of breaths in one minute. Have you noticed problems with the baby's breathing?

Mama Bridgit, this is Brenda from Mathare. Breastfeeding a baby immediately after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & protects the baby from illness. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?

Quinter, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. You should take the baby to the health facility if the baby stops breastfeeding well, has any abnormal movement such as jerking or stiffening, has fast breathing or becomes less active. Does your baby have any of those problems? Please let us know if your baby has any of these or other problems?

Esther, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Until your baby reaches 3 months you should always bring your baby to the clinic or hospital if they are having a fever or have no appretite or seem very fatigued. Try not to give your baby medication without talking to the nurse. Have you noticed anything concerning this week?

Hii ilikuwa njia ya asili ya kuruhusu kichwa chake kupita kwa njia ya uzazi wakati wa kujifungua. Ikiwa sehemu hiyo ya kichwa ya kupumulia imeingia ndani sana hiyo inaweza kuwa ishara ya kutokuwa na maji mwilini. Inaweza pia kufura kidogo mtoto akilia, lakini inapaswa kurudi kwa kawaida wakati anaacha - ikiwa sivyo, mpeleke kwa daktari au muuguzi. Umeona yeyote haya?

Mama Clint, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop – if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?

Maggie, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop – if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?

Mary, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop – if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?

Philsa, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop – if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?

Aluoch, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop – if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?

Mama Prince, this is Brenda from Mathare. Newborns need to be kept warm. Dry the baby right after birth and keep the baby skin-to-skin with you. Please avoid baths in the first days. When a baby gets sick they can be very hot or very cold. Does the baby seem hot or cold? Do you have a thermometer?

Or is the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign. Is your baby moving when they are awake?

Aphline, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Watoto mara nyingi hupumua kwa haraka lakini inaweza kuwa tatizo ikiwa wanapumwa na mlio wa kifua, pua zao zinpanuka au kutoa sauti kifuani wanapopumuwa. Unapaswa kuja kliniki ikiwa unaona yoyote haya. Je! Mtoto wako ana masuala yoyote ya kupumua au kula?

Mama Isaac, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Furahia kumjua mtoto wako: Ongea na yeye na kujifunza ishara yake wakati amelala au ana njaa. Mama Sheila, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo.Angalia mikono na miguu ya watoto ili kuangalia kama ni manjano. Ikiwa una wasiwasi kuhusu rangi ya ngozi ya mtoto, tafadhali tujulishe au leta mtoto kwenye kliniki. Je! Umeona ishara yeyote ya manjano Je! Mikono na miguu ya mtoto ni manjano?

Purity, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies often breath fast but it can be a problem if they are grunting, their nose flares or they are wheezing. You should come to clinic if you notice any of these. Is your baby having any issues with their breathing or feeding?

Mama Joseph, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wakati mwingine wamama wa mara ya kwanza wanaweza kuhisi huzuni au wasiwasi wakati wowote. Hii hutokea kwa wanawake wengi na inaweza kusababisha kulia na ugumu wa kulala. Una matatizo yoyote haya?

Lilian Musyoka, this is Brenda from Mathare. Make sure you come in 4 times for antenatal care. We check your blood to see if it is strong, check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. The 4th visit includes checking that the baby is in a good position. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?

Mama Nancy, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?

Martha Maluki, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako ana sehemu mbili za laini kwenye kichwa chake (fontanelles) ambako mifupa ya fuvu bado haijaunganishwa. Hii ilikuwa njia ya asili ya kuruhusu kichwa chake kupita kwa njia ya uzazi wakati wa kujifungua. Ikiwa sehemu hiyo ya kichwa ya kupumulia imeingia ndani sana hiyo inaweza kuwa ishara ya kutokuwa na maji mwilini. Inaweza pia kufura kidogo mtoto akilia, lakini inapaswa kurudi kwa kawaida wakati anaacha - ikiwa sivyo, mpeleke kwa daktari au muuguzi. Umeona yeyote haya?

Mama Victor, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. IUCD au Coil inaufanisi sana kwa upangaji uzazi.ni rahisi kuweka ndani,salama kwa miaka.IUCD au coil yaweza kutolewa wakati wowote!uliza juu ya coil kwa ziara yako ya upangaji uzazi.unajua yeyote anayetumia coil?

Rose, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies often breath faster than older children but when it is very fast, this can be a sign of infection. The baby should breath less than 60 times per minute. If you are worried about your baby's breathing try and count the number of breaths in one minute. Have you noticed problems with the baby's breathing?

Welcome to Mobile WACh NEO! Good job coming in for your visit! You will receive weekly SMS to help support you during pregnancy and during the first months of your baby's life. Please SMS back and tell us any questions or concerns you have.

Linet, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Watoto wachanga hulala sana lakini hawawezi kulala kwa saa zaidi ya 2-4 kwa wakati mmoja. Unaweza bado kuwa macho mara kadhaa usiku ili kubadilisha, kulisha na kumbembeleza mtoto wako. Lala pia wakati mtoto wako analala na jaribu na ushirikiane na mtoto wako wakati wa mchana na hakikisha kuna utulivu usiku na giza . Je! Mtoto wako hulalaje?

Mama Darren, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?

Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?

Rachael, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop – if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?
